attributes.action: Limit the pay rises of MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Limit the pay rise to the rate of inflation on the 1st April each year. Also to award automatically the same rate of pay increase to all public sector workers. Teachers, police, fire services, ambulance service, nurses and any not listed here but who are paid by the public purse. This is to ensure that   those in positions of power cannot give themselves excessive increases and also those on the front lines are properly acknowledged for the vital work they do.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
